animeDescription: Short children's anime depicting Neko-kun, Nyaago, Usagi-kun, Kuma-kun, and other forest animals in their daily lives. It originally aired as a part of the early morning children's program Hirake! Ponkikki before the anime was combined and released on VHS.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Nemurenu Yoru no Chiisana Ohanashi']
